Address.label: Address
Address.value: ONE DAUCH DRIVE, DETROIT, Michigan, 48211-1198, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: American Axle & Mfg Holdings Inc is engaged in manufacturing, engineering, designing and validation of driveline systems and related components and chassis modules for light trucks, SUVs, crossover vehicles, passenger cars and commercial vehicles. Its product portfolio consist of vehicle architectures, driveline systems, drivetrain systems, powertrain components, chassis system components, and metal formed products. The Company generates majority of its revenue from the United States.
